about_the_game:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/335770/
This game has been registered in Early Access.
Please join us. :)

A long time ago, there was a continent called Orbis Terrarum.

* Game Title
Tkl Online

* For fans of
Like Online games
Like MMO/RPGs
Customizable characters
More depth than the usual RPG Maker system

* Contents
Tkl Online (TO) is an MMO-style single player RPG created with RPG Maker VX.

You are a human in the world of Orbis Terrarum, where monsters and magic are real.

Be one who slaughters monsters with an arsenal of weapons.
Be one who can down monsters in one swoop with powerful magic casts.
Be one who develops skills to capture monsters.
Be one who buys and sells goods and supports other adventurers.

Orbis Terrarum is a free-roaming open world where you can become anything.

- Original UI
- Mouse gameplay

Check out etails on the homepage -> http://www.takapi.info/gamedesign/to/

name: Tkl Online Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WindowsXP, vista, or 7
  • Processor: 1GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keybord and Mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WindowsXP, vista, or 7
  • Processor: 1GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keybord and Mouse
